required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: BABA Robotic Thyroidectomy Without Gas is Safe Enough as That Use a Gas
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Randomized, and Controlled Study of the Safety and Efficacy in Gasless BABA(Bilateral Axillo-breast Approach) Robotic Thyroidectomy

brief_summary.textblock: In this study, a randomized controlled study was conducted between two groups of 14 classic recipients of Carbon dioxide insufflation during BABA robotic-thyroidectomy and 14 recipients of Gasless method during BABA robotic-thyroidectomy. This is a study to see if there is any difference in hemodynamic and metabolic changes and pain .

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline heart rate at the end of surgery
primary_outcome.description: heart rate in beats per minute

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline mean arterial pressure at the end of surgery
Change from baseline cardiac index at the end of surgery
primary_outcome.description: cardiac index in L/min/m^2, divide the cardiac output by the person's body surface area, measured by the Vigileo monitor, normal range is 2.5 to 4.5L/min/m2

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline cardiac output at the end of surgery
primary_outcome.description: cardiac output in L/minute, calculated by multiplying the stroke volume by the heart rate, measured by the Vigileo monitor

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline pH at the end of surgery
Change from baseline PaCO2 at the end of surgery
change from baseline VAS up to 3days after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Visual Analog Score for pain, range from 0 to 10, Higher the values represents more pains

primary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline BHC up to 3days after surgery
primary_outcome.description: bottom hit count from intravenous patient controlled analgesia for pain

primary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline number of analgesics up to 3days after surgery

arm_group.description: BABA robotic-thyroidectomy that do not using carbon dioxide but using elevation of flap.

intervention.description: BABA robotic-thyroidectomy that is using elevation of flap instead of using carbon dioxide.
BABA robotic-thyroidectomy that is using carbon dioxide.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject who will have thyroid surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject who underwent thyroid surgery
- Subject who underwent any radiotherapy on neck
- Subject who need to neck dissection
- Subject under 18 years or over 70 years
- Bad general condition
- High American Society of Anesthesiologists(ASA) score (over 3)
- Breast feeder or pregnancy
- Subject who disagree to do this trial
